title: Very nice hotel with amazing viewsβ€
content:
The sea View from our room was amazing. The balcony was also decent sized and real good value for money. Only downside was the distance from the happening centre of Istanbul i.e Taksim , Sultan Ahmet etc. But there was a very honest round the hour taxi service available at the front. They were really very helpful and honest and one can reach the city centre within 15 Min. 
Amazing staff . Helpful , forthcoming and respectful.

title: Serviceβ€
content: Arrogant front desk staff, check in took 25 - 30 minutes as staff busy on mobile.   Room temperature could not be adjusted, Front desk staff - Kann Aksut kept staying he was helping, making it sound he was doing a favour.  Room service horrible - 4 hours for a set of towels. Maintenance work was being carried out in one of the room so noisy.  Kettle was dirty.

title: I don't recommend this hotel!β€
content:
Pros: good gym and our cleaning men Ismail was amazing, very friendly and nice.
Cons: location, the hotel is located super far from all attractions, you can find around only car supplies shops. 
The mens at the reception was rude and unwelcoming, not up to 5 star hotel standards at all. 
Food was not fresh ,my wife got a food poisoning after eating at the hotel restaurant.  
Staff at the restaurant keep forgetting our orders.
The furniture is very old and damaged and the heating system wasn't working properly.

title: λ¬΄λ‚ν•¨β€
content: Most pathetic service . Fake picture of hotel building . Worse service . Donβ€™t even give you water or extra blanket if you feel cold . And demand extra money .  I was provided with a room which was so cold . Staff at reception was so rude . The manager him self shouted over me  when as a tourist I asked him some information . hotel_name: λ°ν†¤ λ² μ΄μ¤μΈλ£¨ MLS νΈν…” (Molton Beyoglu MLS Hotel)
title: Never go their β€
content:
Most pathetic service . Fake picture of hotel building . Worse service . Donβ€™t even give you water or extra blanket if you feel cold . And demand extra money .  I was provided with a room which was so cold . Staff at reception was so rude . The manager him self shouted over me  when as a tourist I asked him some information . 
Day front desk duty person was better but night duty front desk /reception person was so arrogant and rude and misbehaving . Starring you with weird looks . I paid big money to them but they disgrace me . And services were worse . Spa staff was good . My washroom was so cold that after having this four start hotel still I daily go to spa for taking shower where hamam was hot competitively.  Spa manager was very kind . Turkish government should take action against such fake hotels as Istanbul is the hub for tourist and such hotels spoil the reputation and image of Istanbul . 
Thankyou

Relationship Mananger mis Rana was very helpful went out of her way to make my stay comfortable 
Hole staff was very friendly 
Itβ€™s ok to take taxi from hotel they are cheaper then Uber by meter some taxi driver donβ€™t want to use meter ask for more money to pay Becarefull when you go to Grand bazar but shopping is cheep out at grand bazaar you can negotiate the price itβ€™s ok they donβ€™t get angry itβ€™s beautiful place to see

title: Everything was good, except for 1 thingβ€¦β€
content: Hotel has nice accommodations and personnel is friendly. Be aware: we had a smoke-free room, but, even then if youβ€™re not a smoker and donβ€™t want to smell sigaret smoke during the stay in your room, this hotel is not a good fit for you. This holds true if you have room 2027.

content: Rooms are great and so is the location to be honest, room service is not good enough food isnβ€™t as tasteful as it should be, they also add extra charges to room service bills Iβ€™ve caught them out a few times. hotel_name: λλ””μ¨ λΈ”λ£¨ νΈν…” μ΄μ¤νƒ„λ¶ μ¤ν† λ§λ  (Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Ottomare)
title: Very nice hotel with amazing viewsβ€
content:
The sea View from our room was amazing. The balcony was also decent sized and real good value for money. Only downside was the distance from the happening centre of Istanbul i.e Taksim , Sultan Ahmet etc. But there was a very honest round the hour taxi service available at the front. They were really very helpful and honest and one can reach the city centre within 15 Min. 
Amazing staff . Helpful , forthcoming and respectful.

title: Clean and friendlyβ€
content: The staff were so accommodating even though most things were closed when i went. The garden room was amazing and the terrace super relaxing. The area around the hotel doesn't have much, but the water is nice.

hotel_name: λλ””μ¨ λΈ”λ£¨ νΈν…” μ΄μ¤νƒ„λ¶ μ¤ν† λ§λ  (Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Ottomare)
title: Serviceβ€
content: Arrogant front desk staff, check in took 25 - 30 minutes as staff busy on mobile.   Room temperature could not be adjusted, Front desk staff - Kann Aksut kept staying he was helping, making it sound he was doing a favour.  Room service horrible - 4 hours for a set of towels. Maintenance work was being carried out in one of the room so noisy.  Kettle was dirty.

hotel_name: λλ””μ¨ λΈ”λ£¨ νΈν…” μ΄μ¤νƒ„λ¶ μ¤ν† λ§λ  (Radisson Blu Hotel Istanbul Ottomare)
title: I don't recommend this hotel!β€
content:
Pros: good gym and our cleaning men Ismail was amazing, very friendly and nice.
Cons: location, the hotel is located super far from all attractions, you can find around only car supplies shops. 
The mens at the reception was rude and unwelcoming, not up to 5 star hotel standards at all. 
Food was not fresh ,my wife got a food poisoning after eating at the hotel restaurant.  
Staff at the restaurant keep forgetting our orders.
The furniture is very old and damaged and the heating system wasn't working properly.

content: Very nice and clean, spacious room. Staff is very polite and always at disposal. Breakfast was great. Good location, calm and far enough from noise and rush. Many facilities are included in the price what is really amazing. Gym, welness and spa are great. Absolutely recommend!

title: Good hotelβ€
content:
The hotel has it's own shack with a fantastic view. The view from our room of the sea was very pretty. The balcony was pretty small, just enough for 2 chairs and a small table. They have a variety of food and drinks options as well. Staff is courteous.
Though there are a line of hotels and you can hear people from the other hotel rooms. Overall good location though, comfortable room and good bathroom. Room was big but bathroom was pretty small, though they did give all toiletries but no shower gel which was weird.

title: Clean, creative hotel and supportive staffβ€
content: It is a very creative hotel with very helpful and always smiling staff. I will come here again for sure in my next visit to Antalya.

title: Nice locationβ€
content: We booked our stay with agoda.com. Option was room with sea view. When we came to our room it was wall view. The receptionist told me that maybe we made a reservation with side sea viewπ™„, but our room was not even that. I showed them my reservation and it was sea view. However, we had to pay some extra to have sea view. It was not much but still they could have been good host, insted they didnβ€™t left me good impression. The receptionist was very polite thou, but the boss told him what to do. So our room was very small

title: Tres bon hotelβ€
content: Un style unique avec une tres belle vue sur la mer .

title: I wouldn't recommend itβ€
content: The location of this hotel isn't too far from the Old Town, and the staff is friendly and willing to help with anything. However, no matter how expensive accommodation in Antalya is, I wouldn't pay this price to stay in a small, windowless basement. There was no a notixe about the basement room when I booked, and the soundproofing of the hotel was so bad that it made my stay here less than pleasant. I hope other people will be aware of this fact.

title: μµκ³ β€
content:
We had an amazing time there.
Breakfast is so fresh and you can taste lots of Turkish meze and many breads.
Host Mehmet is so friendly and enthusiastic about sharing beauty of Cappadocia. we went there with no plan and he recommended a lot of good spots to visit. Also introduced a reliable Van company at fairly cheap price for us so we can do private tours my. From helps from him, our trip to Cappadocia will be remembered long in our memory. Thank you!

title: where I want to liveβ€
content: It's too bad that I only stayed for 2 nights because of my schedule. It is a beautiful space that harmonizes with the surrounding landscape. The staff are very kind and friendly. Breakfast is served on the terrace with a nice view, and even the basic bread is delicious. It's a taste I want to eat every day, and I want to take it to my country too. In the evening, you can enjoy the night view from the rooftop, and in the morning, you can see hot air balloons rising. It was the best experience in Turkiye.
